pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to Google RE2 (C++) Regular Expression Library // Pattern matching, extraction, replacement and other string processing operations using Google's RE2 https://github.com/google/re2 regular-expression engine. Consistent interface (similar to 'stringr'). RE2 uses finite- automata based techniques, and offers a fast and safe alternative to backtracking regular-expression engines like those used in 'stringr', 'stringi' and other PCRE implementations.
